cab.content: d ^ 15(This Document is the Property of *)ofritannic Majesty^ Government.)SECRET.Operations.Prom :- F.M., C-in-C., France. To C.I.G.S., War Office.Handed in at 10.9 p,m. 14.11*17. Received at 11.0 p.m. 14.11.17.0.B.A./16. 14.11.17. 9.30 p.m.G.O.C., R.F.C. reports to me as follows ,!0n the night of November 13th - November 14th, weather was unfavourable for bombing operations by Nancy squadrons. A raid was attempted this morning but owing to thick fog being encountered east of the battle line the raid was forced to return."Secretary,War Cabinet.Circulated for the information of theCabinet.General Staff, War Office.15th November, 1917.
